alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 6:55PM CDT until September 09 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Claiborne County in east Tennessee... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 755 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harrogate, or 7 miles south of Middlesboro, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tazewell, Harrogate, Cumberland Gap, Arthur, and Powell River Preserve. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
